long_description: The Osprey Hydraulics(TM) LT 2.5-Liter Reservoir offers a simple way to stay hydrated when you're traveling by bike or on foot. Its lightweight, streamlined design is perfect for small packs. Taste-free polyethylene material is strong and durable; material is BPA- and PVC-free. Antimicrobial formula helps prevent the growth of mold and bacteria inside the reservoir. Wide-mouth opening makes it easy to fill and clean reservoir; detachable hose connection point also aids cleaning. Built-in baffles reduce sloshing; 180deg pivoting on/off valve rotates for easy flow control. Osprey Hydraulics LT 2.5L Reservoir weighs a mere 6 oz. and measures 17 x 8 x 2 in.
short_description: The Osprey Hydraulics(TM) LT 2.5-Liter Reservoir offers a simple way to stay hydrated when you're traveling by bike or on foot. Its lightweight, streamlined design is perfect for small packs.
